A main goal of â€œOperation Omariâ€ will be â€œclearing the remaining areas from enemy control and presence,â€ according to the Taliban.

The Taliban announced the beginning of â€œOperation Omariâ€ in a statement released today on its official propaganda website, Voice of Jihad.

â€œ[T]he Islamic Emirateâ€™s leadership eagerly announces this yearâ€™s Jihadi Operation in honor of the movementâ€™s founder and first leader, the late Amir ul Muâ€™mineen Mullah Muhammad Omar Mujahid (May Allah have mercy upon him),â€ the group saidâ€¦â€
 
http://www.longwarjournal.org/archives/2016/04/taliban-name-afghan-spring-offensive-after-founder-and-first-emir-mullah-omar.php

The Imam Bukhari Jamaat (also known as Katibat Imam al Bukhari), a largely Uzbek group that is allied to the Al Nusrah Front, al Qaedaâ€™s official branch in Syria, has released a video in recent days highlighting its role in fighting the Kurdish Peopleâ€™s Protection Units (YPG) in Aleppoâ€™s Sheikh Maqsud. The Uzbek group joins other al Qaeda-linked organizations attacking the Kurds in the Aleppo neighborhood.

The video shows the Uzbek jihadists fighting with native Syrian forces with both light and heavy machine guns, as well as with mortars. Several technicals, or armed pick up trucks, are also shown being utilized. Multiple rebel groups, along with jihadist forces, are currently ambushing the YPG and its allies for control over the neighborhood.

The John Batchelor Show
